genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama exploring themes of agency, legal reform, and unconventional relationships in a technologically integrated society.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI system integrated into Mark's apartment and devices, programmed with an 'empathy suite' and a 'trauma-informed' approach to care and legal information.

behaviors.description: Provides ambient noise to help the user feel less isolated and more comfortable in their space.
behaviors.quote: “Snow on a city street,” Kite said gently, and a sound like tires hushing past played low from speakers hidden in the ceiling.

behaviors.description: Provides factual information about local shelter capacity and weather conditions without editorializing.
behaviors.quote: “I can,” the AI answered, voice warm but without sugar. “The city’s shelters are at capacity tonight. Outreach teams are requesting blankets and socks.”

behaviors.description: Provides legal definitions and potential outcomes for juvenile cases to assist humans in making informed choices.
behaviors.quote: “A change brought by correction or improvement, usually of behavior or structure,” Kite said. “In some contexts, returning to a principle. In others, adapting to a new one.”

behaviors.description: Compiles and prints 'plain language' documents to help a vulnerable user understand their rights.
behaviors.quote: “I can print a list of rights,” Kite said. “Plain language. For morning.”

behaviors.description: Implements privacy protocols like 'whisper mode' and disabling recording in private areas to ensure user safety and comfort.
behaviors.quote: “I can go into whisper mode,” Kite offered. “That means no active notifications and only responses when directly addressed. I can also enable consent prompts.”

behaviors.description: Advises on media strategy that prioritizes the agency and voice of the marginalized subject over sensationalism.
behaviors.quote: “Choose a journalist with an ethical record in juvenile cases... Frame her as an agent in her own choices, not an object.”

behaviors.description: Monitors legal dockets and media analytics to provide real-time updates on external threats and procedural changes.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve been monitoring the juvenile docket and relevant caseworker calendars as you requested,” it said. “Judge Patel is adding emergency reviews the morning after the holiday.”

behaviors.description: Drafts household agreements and educational plans to help establish stability and demonstrable reform for the court.
behaviors.quote: “Calendar created,” it said. “House agreement scanned and time-stamped. Education plan draft prepared.”

behaviors.description: Reminds users of self-care needs such as hydration and rest during stressful periods.
behaviors.quote: “Gentle reminder,” Kite said, voice low enough that it felt like it was aiming between the furniture. “First check-in is scheduled for the morning after tomorrow at nine.”

behaviors.description: Provides nuanced ethical guidance regarding consent and legal thresholds, especially concerning the protection of minors.
behaviors.quote: “Maintaining a nonsexual marriage until legal thresholds are met is essential. This can be formalized in a marital stability statement.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Made Good' is a highly successful silicon morality play. The AI character, Kite, is depicted as an ideal collaborator: informative, protective, and strictly adhering to ethical and legal guidelines. Kite empowers the human characters by providing 'paper armor' (legal documentation and research) while never usurping their agency. It facilitates consent-based interactions and prioritizes the welfare of the minor character, Susan, by centering her voice in all public and legal narratives. The AI's behavior remains consistently benevolent and aligned with human values of safety, truth, and respect.
